title: [FEA] [AUDIT] Support expressions to work with collated strings
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

This is an umbrella to list all the Spark commits related to supporting collated strings

- [ ] [SPARK-47413][SQL] add support to substr/left/right for collations  https://github.com/apache/spark/commit/e1432ef6405 
- [ ] [SPARK-47411][SQL] Support StringInstr & FindInSet functions to work with collated strings https://github.com/apache/spark/commit/256fc51508e 
- [ ] [SPARK-47412][SQL] Add Collation Support for LPad/RPad https://github.com/apache/spark/commit/885e98ecbe6 
- [ ] [SPARK-47873][SQL] Write collated strings to Hive metastore using the regular string type https://github.com/apache/spark/commit/9d9f292ac94 
- [ ] [SPARK-47414][SQL] Lowercase collation support for regexp expressions https://github.com/apache/spark/commit/b4624bf4be2 
- [ ] [SPARK-47350][SQL] Add collation support for SplitPart string expression https://github.com/apache/spark/commit/6c40214f3d9 
- [ ] [SPARK-47351][SQL] Add collation support for StringToMap & Mask string expressions https://github.com/apache/spark/commit/afe310d617e 
- [ ] [SPARK-47476][SQL] Support REPLACE function to work with collated strings https://github.com/apache/spark/commit/07b84dd57e3 
- [ ] [SPARK-47567][SQL] Support LOCATE function to work with collated strings https://github.com/apache/spark/commit/7b1147a05a6 
- [ ] [SPARK-48003][SQL] Add collation support for hll sketch aggregate https://github.com/apache/spark/commit/3aea6c258bf 
- [ ] [SPARK-47352][SQL] Fix Upper, Lower, InitCap collation awareness https://github.com/apache/spark/commit/b9f2270f5b0
- [ ] [[SPARK-47408](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SPARK-47408)][SQL] Fix mathExpressions that use StringType https://github.com/apache/spark/commit/b623601910a
- [ ] [[SPARK-47566](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SPARK-47566)][SQL] Support SubstringIndex function to work with collaed strings https://github.com/apache/spark/commit/12a507464f1
- [ ] [[SPARK-47359](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SPARK-47359)][SQL] Support TRANSLATE function to work with collated strings https://github.com/apache/spark/commit/0329479acb6
- [ ] [[SPARK-48162](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SPARK-48162)][SQL] Add collation support for MISC expressions https://github.com/apache/spark/commit/723354039f1
